description: Proposal: 20/00608/SCOP - Request for observations from City of London for a scoping opinion for the following works: The demolition of the existing buildings and the construction of an office-led, mixed use building (up to an approximate maximum height of 170m above ordnance datum), comprising:- Approximately 100,000m2 GIA of office (B1) space;- Approximately 1,900m2 GIA of flexible retail (A1-A5) space;- Approximately 1,000m2 GIA of tenant dedicated lobby space;- Approximately 2,800m2 GIA of publicly accessible event space (Sui Generis);- Servicing facilities, ancillary space, plant space, external terraces and associated landscaping. The building is expected to comprise three key elements: the 'Podium' (spanning from Ground Floor to Level 12), the 'West Tower' (providing up to 23 storeys), and the 'East Tower' (providing up to 37 storeys). The proposed development would also include three basement levels.
